Text: anybody know where i can find Rios v Alvarado?

Thanks. Great fight. I wanted Cotto to win, but Trout is a great fighter and did a great fight, he deserve the win. I only think that the fight was closer than the judges saw it.
Berto v Alvarez was a great fight also ... Berto's been in some real wars in his relatively young career
